email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, what’s the laycan for the MV Ocean Star? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet halfway at $48.00 per metric ton? The laycan for the MV Ocean Star is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. The laycan works for us as well. Could you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.00 works for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm the final details. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ve confirmed the booking for the MV Ocean Star with a laycan of October 15-20, freight rate at $48.00 per metric ton, and demurrage at $20,000 per day. I’ll send over the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
